scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:clients && npm run -ws build
scripts.build:contracts: stellar contract build --package verifier && stellar contract build --package credential_registry && stellar contract build --package compliance_oracle
scripts.build:clients: stellar contract bindings typescript --contract-id verifier --output-dir packages/verifier --overwrite && stellar contract bindings typescript --contract-id credential_registry --output-dir packages/credential_registry --overwrite && stellar contract bindings typescript --contract-id compliance_oracle --output-dir packages/compliance_oracle --overwrite
scripts.optimize:contracts: stellar contract optimize --wasm target/wasm32v1-none/release/verifier.wasm && stellar contract optimize --wasm target/wasm32v1-none/release/credential_registry.wasm && stellar contract optimize --wasm target/wasm32v1-none/release/compliance_oracle.wasm
scripts.typecheck: npm run -ws build --if-present && echo typecheck done
